history.content: I'm staying just one or two nights in Amsterdam and want a no-frills hotel that's reliable and not overpriced. Any suggestions?

The Modern Hideaway seems like a solid choice based on its rating and proximity to the city center. It offers amenities like room service, terrace, garden, free billiards, and a hot tub, which should meet your needs while being budget-friendly. However, keep an eye out for any issues mentioned in the internal reviews regarding reliability and comfort levels.
Do you think the Hotel Amsterdam City Center Plus would be suitable? It sounds like it might fit my needs without breaking the bank.

Hotel Amsterdam City Center Plus is another option worth considering. It has a great location near the city center and provides amenities like room service, air conditioning, and a rooftop terrace. While some guests mention occasional issues with Wi-Fi, overall it appears to offer a reliable stay.
Thank you, that was very helpful. That's all I needed, goodbye.
